resources.string: Show photos from commons.wikimedia.org near a given location.

" This app adds the option *🌍📷 Photos Nearby* to any app that can shown/send/share a geo location or **geo-uri** .
This app hooks into the android system to intercept "view geo-uri". When getting a geo-uri it puts the geo-location into a databasequery and asks www.wikidata.org to display the result in a web browser.
Note: The app has no userinterface of it-s own.
Note: You can use [the commons app](https://f-droid.org/packages/fr.free.nrw.commons/) to upload photos to commons.wikimedia.org.
Here are some f-droid apps that are compatible with *🌍📷 Photos Nearby*
* navigation: [OsmAnd](https://f-droid.org/packages/net.osmand.plus/), * public transportation: [Transportr](https://f-droid.org/packages/de.grobox.liberario) or [oeffi](https://f-droid.org/packages/de.schildbach.oeffi) * translate postal address to geo [Acastus Photon ](https://f-droid.org/packages/name.gdr.acastus_photon) * Share your current position [LocationShare](https://f-droid.org/packages/ca.cmetcalfe.locationshare) or [My Position](https://f-droid.org/packages/net.mypapit.mobile.myposition)
----
Required Android Permissions:
* none . "
